channel.title: Easy questions ( I m a uber noob )
channel.description:
Server: Dark of Realm
1.People can attack eachother everywhere i only want to in wildy and a pkbox
2.how can i make an emote named pkbox that it teleports to a pkbox
3.how can i change shop locations
4.how can i put walls around pkbox
5.how to make ::commands that a list with commands comes
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ( Who can help me at all questions ) Can be admin on my server and gets 1.5m on runescape ( i want 1st prove that it works )

item.title: Easy questions ( I m a uber noob )
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

That made no sense. For X, you need the bottom left, and bottom right coords. For Y, you need the bottom right, and top right coords, then put in this code:

(absX >= first x && absX <= second x && absY >= first y && absY <= second y) ||

Read full topic
item.source: Easy questions ( I m a uber noob )

in boolean nonWild add this after one of the ||:

 (absX >= 2220 && absX <= 2222 && absY >= 2221 && absY <= 2224) ||

item.source: Easy questions ( I m a uber noob )

item.title: Easy questions ( I m a uber noob )
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

  1. Learn to use boolean nonWild. Delete all coords inside it and make your own from scratch.

  2. Find the case of the emote button and add a method to it. Get a sendQuest for the button and name it.

  3. Get the ID of the shop NPC that you want to move. Go into autospawn.cfg and find the ID for that NPC. Change the coords.

  4. Do fedexer’s global objects tut and add objects in.

  5. Make a command called “commands” and either copy another quest page and add the commands in, or use continous sendMessages.

All of that can be done with an incentive to learn.

Read full topic
